Package io.ib67.astralflow.machines

Interface IMachine

All Superinterfaces:
LifeCycle, Tickable<IMachine>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMachine
@AvailableSince("0.1.0") public interface IMachine extends Tickable<IMachine>, LifeCycle
Basic definition of a machine. We don't subclass this as usual, see AbstractMachine
